GREATSWORDS <-->
MH_Greatsword Greatsword An absurdly large blade of the greatsword was designed for hunting monsters. The sheer size of this weapon will slow whoever equips it considerably. Due to it's massive size it can be used to block some incoming attacks.

MH_Greatsword_Wyvern Wyvern Ignition An absurdly large blade of the greatsword was designed for hunting monsters. The sheer size of this weapon will slow whoever equips it considerably. LONGSWORDS <-->
MH_Longsword Longsword The blade of this weapon is over 2 meters long. It can slash an unarmored person in half with ease. Due to its length handling this weapon is tricky and will slow the wearer down.

MH_Chargeblade Charge Blade A mechanically complex weapon, capable of discharging phials causing explosions in front of the user. It comes with a large shield that allows the user to block most attacks coming their way. It's size will slow the wearer down.

MH_Switchaxe Switch Axe A curious mechanical monstrosity, capable of transforming between an axe and a sword mode. Axe mode allows for faster movement, but lower damage attacks, while sword mode slows the wearer more but increases the attack power.
